content: >brighten up the clean-up with this handy crochet scrubby that has a dazzling disposition crochet it with just 3 simple rounds in red heart scrubby sparkle then add a cute scallop edging to complete your project make it as designed for kitchen or bath or create a whole bouquet of hard-working scrubbies in cheerful shades give them to friends teachers family and more yarnspirations website *this handy scrubby will brighten your time washing the dishes crochet it with just three simple rounds and then add a scallop edging round it s perfect in the bathroom too * red heart website
